title: Bacon Cheeseburger Meatball Recipe (Low Carb and Gluten Free)
directions: Combine all of the meatball ingredients in a medium bowl and mix thoroughly. Form into 12 meatballs. Fry in a non-stick pan in the reserved bacon fat (or use the oil of your choice) for about 4 minutes for the first side. Turn them over and top each with a slice of cheese. Cook for another 4 minutes, or until done to your liking. Remove from the heat, and top each meatball with a piece of bacon.
Combine all of the sauce ingredients in a small bowl and whisk together until smooth.
Place 1 cup of shredded iceburg lettuce on a plate. Top with 3 meatballs and drizzle with about 1½ Tablespoons of sauce.
ingredients: 1 lb ground beef (I like 80/20 for these)
¼ cup chopped raw bacon (from the fatty ends)
bacon fat to cook the meatballs in
1 Tbsp sugar free (or low sugar) ketchup
1 Tbsp dill pickle juice (or dill pickle relish if you prefer chunks)
3 slices of bacon, cooked and broken into 12 pieces
